実は……月ヶ瀬さんの研究データを漏洩させたのは、私よ……: Actually... I'm the one who leaked Tsukigase-san's research data...
少し前にメイズ研究同好会の研究室に忍び込んで、\nデータを抜き取ったの……:
I snuck into the lab of the Mayse Research Society a little while ago
I pulled out the data...
止めないで、白奈！ こいつのせいで、ちゆるが……！: Don't stop me, Shirona! It's all because of her...!
特別養成校舎の教官から、言われたの。: The instructor at the special training building told me.
『月ヶ瀬ちゆるは天才だけど、その成果を父親に奪われているの』\n『ろくな見返りも:
“Chiyori Tsukigase is a genius, but her father has stolen the fruits of her labor.”
“There’s nothing good in return, and we’re earning research funding from the pilots’ rewards.”
今思えばおかしい話だけど、そのときの私はそれが本当なら許されない\nと思った。真:
Thinking back on it now, it’s strange, but at the time, I wouldn’t be forgiven if it were true
Or so I thought. It's not right to take a sincere effort for no reason.
それから月ヶ瀬さんと話して、知ったわ。\nただのメイズオタクなんかじゃない、目標:
After that, I talked to Tsukigase-san and learned about it.
She’s not just a maise otaku—she’s someone who can work hard for her goals.
この人は報われないといけない……そう考えていた時に、\n教官から言われたの。:
This person has to be rewarded... Just as I was thinking that...
Instructor Rean told me.
研究者としての実績を証明する資料が欲しいと。それがあれば\n月ヶ瀬さんが正当な評:
He wants documents to prove his achievements as a researcher. If he has them
She said she wanted to make sure Tsukigase-san received a fair evaluation and compensation.
（それは確かにある意味では嘘ではなかったが……\nちゆる自身の気持ちや都合が、ま:
(That certainly wasn't a lie in a way, but...)
It's as if Chiyuru's own feelings and circumstances have completely slipped out...)
……顔を上げて、キミは何も悪くないよ。\n単に利用されただけでしょ？:
...Look up. You didn't do anything wrong.
You're just being used, aren't you?
あたしのことを想ってやってくれた。そんな優しいキミのことを、\n責めたりなんてし:
She did it out of consideration for me. For such a kind person like you,
I'm not blaming you. In fact, my affection points have exploded!
というか、キミが何もしなくても、いつかこうなっていたと思うよ。\n隠し事はいつか:
Actually, even if you hadn't done anything, I think this would have happened someday.
They say you'll find out what you're hiding someday.
他に隠していることはないか？: Is there anything else you're hiding?
念の為に聞いておこうと思ってな。もう起こったことは仕方ないさ。\nただ今後まだ何:
I thought I'd ask, just in case. What happened can't be helped.
But if something else happens in the future, I figured I could deal with it in advance.
大丈夫。もう隠し事はないわ。誓って。: Don't worry. There's nothing left to hide. I swear.
ま、他とはいっても、これ以上暴露されて困ることもないけどね。: Well, even if it's something else, there's no need to worry about being exposed any further.
これ以上自分を責めるなよ？ 確かにやったことは良くないことだ。\nただその理不尽:
Don't blame yourself anymore, okay? What you did was definitely not good.
But I want you to treasure the feeling of not forgiving that irrationality.
え、なに急に優しいキャラになってるの？\n漏洩について責めまくると思ってたのに。:
Huh? Why are you suddenly acting like such a nice character?
I thought you'd be blaming me for the leak.
お前は俺のことを何だと思ってるんだよ。: What do you think I am?
パワハラ系悪辣鬼教官。: He was a crafty Demon Instructor of the Powerharan type.
よーっし分かった。\n今度一日中グラウンドを走ってもらうからな。もちろん、お前ひ:
Alright, got it.
I'll have you run around the grounds all day next time. You alone, of course.
そういう訳だから、この話はここで終わりね。\nキミもあたしと同じ被害者だってこと:
That's why this conversation ends here.
Don't forget that you're a victim just like me.
（しかし気になるな……この一連の騒動、\n目的が見えるようで見えない）:
(Still, I'm curious... about this series of disturbances...)
I can't see it because I can see its purpose.)
（ちゆるをどうしたいんだ？ まさか本当にただ秘密を、\n暴露させたかっただけじゃ:
(What do you want to do with Chiyuru? Don't tell me she really just wants to keep a secret,
I didn't just want you to expose it.)
（娘の研究成果を横取りしたとして、\n龍宮成臣を失脚させようとでもしていたのか？:
(Let's say you snatched away my daughter's research results.
Was he trying to overthrow Narumi Ryuugu?)
（そうじゃない、別の思惑がある気がする。それも今の俺達じゃ、\n想像もつかない『:
(That’s not it. I feel like there’s another plan. And that’s what we’re doing now, too.)
Maybe there's something going on behind the scenes that I can't even imagine...)
――それでは、月ヶ瀬ちゆる争奪戦の詳細について告知します。: ――Now then, I will announce the details of the Tsukigase battle.
翌日、俺達は生徒会室に集められていた。俺やシリウスシュガーの他に、\nフルートと:
The next day, we were gathered in the student council room, in addition to me and Sirius Sugaru
Flute, Dorothea, and her attendant, Lucy, were there.
今回は通常のＭＧ競技ルールではなく、\n『バトルロイヤル』形式で行います。:
This time, it wasn’t a normal MG competition rule
It will be held in the Battle Royale format.
基本的にＭＧ競技は１チーム対１チームの戦いですが、\n今回のために新たに特殊ルー:
Basically, MG competitions are a one-on-one fight, but...
I've prepared a new special rule for this occasion.
簡単にいえば３チームが同時に入り乱れて戦闘し、\n最後に残ったメンバーが所属する:
To put it simply, the three teams were all jumbled together and fighting at the same time
The team that the last remaining member belongs to will be the winner.
開始時刻は明朝、日の出と共に各スタート地点から出撃。: The start time is tomorrow morning, and we'll be deployed from each starting point at sunrise.
試合会場は学園各校区全域です。\n各チームは自由に各校区内を移動してもらって構い:
The match is held throughout the entire school district.
Each team is free to move freely through each school district.
出撃地点は各チームの所属校舎で戦闘中の燃料、弾薬、\n食料などの補給は一切禁止と:
The dispatch point was the school building belonging to each team, fuel and ammunition during battle
We will not allow you to resupply food or other supplies.
学園敷地内から出さえしなければ、索敵するもよし、\n陣地を構えて待ち受けるもよし:
As long as you don't leave the school grounds, you're free to search for enemies.
Set up camp and await us.
敵チームと出会った時点で戦闘を開始し、決着をつける。\nそれがルールのすべてです:
The moment you meet the enemy team, you start a battle and settle it.
That's all the rules.
それって……つまり何でもアリ寄りのアリアリってこと！？: Does that mean......she's like an ant?!
ア、アリ……？\nええ、挑発、欺騙、待ち伏せ、奇襲、何でもありです。:
A-Ant...?
Yes, provocation, deception, ambush, surprise attack—anything is possible.
なるほど……まるで本物の戦場のようですわね……: I see... It's like a real battlefield...
お行儀のよい勝負では、真の実力は測れない……ということですか。: A well-behaved match can’t measure your true strength... Is that what you’re saying?
ええ、月ヶ瀬さんの所属するチームは、強者であることが望ましい。\nつまり、あらゆ:
Yes, the team Tsukigase-san belongs to should be strong.
In other words, you have to show your strength in every aspect.
よって、平等な条件の元に開始される公式ルールではなく、\nこのバトルロイヤル形式:
Therefore, it wasn’t an official rule that would be initiated under equal conditions
We've adopted this battle royale format.
……バトルロイヤル形式か。\nなんともありがたい配慮だな、生徒会長。:
...A battle royale format, huh?
I'm really grateful for her consideration, Student Council President.
カオスメイデン戦と違い、事前対策がまったく足りていない以上、\n公式ルールだと強:
Unlike the Chaos Maiden War, there weren’t enough countermeasures in advance at all
According to the official rules, it was too much for the powerful flutes, Dorothea, and the others.
だが、誰も経験したことのないこのルールならば不確定要素が大きい。\nそれなら俺達:
However, with this rule that no one had ever experienced before, there was a lot of uncertainty.
In that case, we have a chance of winning too.
（『何でもあり』……か。嬉しいこと言ってくれるな、生徒会長）: ('Anything is possible'... huh? The student council president sure is happy to hear that.)
各自、準備があるでしょうし、事前告知はこの辺りにて。悔いの残らない戦いにしてくだ: I'm sure everyone has their own preparations to do, so let's leave the advance notice for now. Please make this a battle without regrets.
どうせフルート達が勝ちますけどね！ では、また明日！: The flutes will win anyway! See you tomorrow!
多くは語りません。決着の刻、戦場にて。: I won't tell you much. At the time of the battle, on the battlefield.
勝つのは、わたくし達ですわ。: We'll be the ones to win.
し、試合前に挑発しちゃ駄目ですよ……: D-Don't provoke him before the match...
